text: A presidential election was held on 20 September 2018 to elect the next president of the Liberal Democratic Party of Japan for a new 3-year term. Incumbent president Shinzo Abe was running for re-election after being allowed to run for a third term. Abe won the election, allowing to him staying as prime minister for just under two years. ==References== Category:2018 elections in Asia Category:2010s in Japan Category:Elections in Japan Category:September 2018 events Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan)
title: 2018 Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) presidential election
